subject: hi Kirk...
body:
Hi there Kirk, just curious, tried to get the Debian floppies 
containing speakup, and thought I got the listing for them I can't 
download them... anything I should be doing?  I'm using standard ftp 
from a dos prompt.  Thanks much...
